text: Hello, how's your Labor Day going?
I had to work how bout you?
Aw that's unfortunate to hear. I spent the day with my son and just finished dinner, now it's back to turking heh.
I took a break and cleaned house and mowed, gonna turk till time to feed cows and horses.
I love horses! Their so majestic and beautiful, do you have many?
I have 2 minis they are only 37 inches tall.
Oh no way minis!!!! They're so adorable! I bet they're a lot of work to take care of though right?
No more than big ones really not as much.
I guess they probably eat less than the big horses too then right?
Yes thank goodness I have mini cows too. I am a little worried. A few counties over from us a big cat either a cougar or panther killed 3 horses and 2 dogs night before last.
Oh wow that's pretty bad. Aside from keeping em in their barn or enclosure at night is there much you can do to prepare for that?
A good fence, have them close to the house and a donkey for protection.
Huh, donkeys must be pretty tough then I guess, never would have imagined that.
Yes very good protector for and herd. They will kill a predator in a heartbeat.
Well that's something I never would have considered. Hey have you ever heard of a organization called Save the Children?
Yes, when my husband had a better job we sponsored a little boy for about 2 years.
Oh wow! That's wonderful to hear, well I wanted to let you know this HIT allows us to donate a portion of our tasks payment directly to the organization!

Yes I saw that. I would love to but haven't worked as much this month due to health reasons and I have a lot to make up. I am paying a car payment with my turk money. My old one was on it's last legs.
I can understand that, if I told you I'd match your donation would you be able to donate just a small portion perhaps? I try to always donate even just a small amount for the suffering kid's sake.
I may could .25 I know thats not much.
